contexts.context: ...The Shrine of Courtesy is found in the heart of the <mark>Puzzle</mark> Canal, a labyrinth beneath Lord Vivec's Palace in the city...
...Palace in the city of Vivec. The journey though the <mark>Puzzle</mark> Canal can be confusing and it is suggested that common pilgrims...
.... The Dremora Krazzt is found in the center of the <mark>Puzzle</mark> Canal, and will accept a plain silver longsword if spoken...
...at his initiation. Beneath the Palace of Vivec is the <mark>Puzzle</mark> Canal, a place of worship and testing for questing heroes...
.... Many choice treasures are guarded by Daedric servants in the <mark>Puzzle</mark> Canal's dark passages.
